result.html: Tá sé i lár an bhaileIt's in the centre of town.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé i lár an ḃaileIt's in the centre of town.

result.eng: It's in that new estate on the edge of town: Riverside.
result.ga: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an bhaile Cois Abhann
result.orig: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an bhaile Cois Abhann
result.html: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an bhaile Cois AbhannIt's in that new estate on the edge of town: Riverside.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé san eastát nua sin ar imeall an ḃaile Cois AḃannIt's in that new estate on the edge of town: Riverside.

result.eng: It's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ga: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.orig: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachta
result.html: Tá sé gar do lár an bhaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireachtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé gar do lár an ḃaile in aice leis an ionad siopadóireaċtaIt's near the centre of town, beside the shopping centre.

result.eng: I live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach beag gar do lár na cathrach i mBaile Átha CliathI live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i dteaċ beag gar do lár na caṫraċ i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫI live in a small house, close to the city centre in Dublin.

result.eng: I'm a musician and I often play guitar at home.
result.ga: Is ceoltóir mé agus seinnim an giotár go minic sa bhaile
result.orig: Is ceoltóir mé agus seinnim an giotár go minic sa bhaile
result.html: Is ceoltóir mé agus seinnim an giotár go minic sa bhaileI'm a musician and I often play guitar at home.
result.ponchtml: Is ceoltóir mé agus seinnim an giotár go minic sa ḃaileI'm a musician and I often play guitar at home.

result.eng: I'm home around six o'clock.
result.ga: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlog
result.orig: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlog
result.html: Bím sa bhaile timpeall a sé a chlogI'm home around six o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Bím sa ḃaile timpeall a sé a ċlogI'm home around six o'clock.

result.eng: What time are you home?
result.ga: Cén t-am a bhíonn tú sa bhaile
result.orig: Cén t-am a bhíonn tú sa bhaile
result.html: Cén t-am a bhíonn tú sa bhaileWhat time are you home?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ḃíonn tú sa ḃaileWhat time are you home?

result.eng: I get up around eight and I have breakfast at home.
result.ga: Éirím timpeall a hocht agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.orig: Éirím timpeall a hocht agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.html: Éirím timpeall a hocht agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa bhaileI get up around eight and I have breakfast at home.
result.ponchtml: Éirím timpeall a hoċt agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa ḃaileI get up around eight and I have breakfast at home.

result.eng: Do you have dinner at home?
result.ga: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa bhaile
result.orig: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa bhaile
result.html: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa bhaileDo you have dinner at home?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa ḃaileDo you have dinner at home?

result.eng: I have my breakfast at home.
result.ga: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.orig: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.html: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaileI have my breakfast at home.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ḃricfeasta agam sa ḃaileI have my breakfast at home.

result.eng: Do you have breakfast at home?

result.html: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaileDo you have breakfast at home?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa ḃaileDo you have breakfast at home?

result.eng: I'm at home at the moment.
result.ga: Tá mé sa bhaile faoi láthair
result.orig: Tá mé sa bhaile faoi láthair
result.html: Tá mé sa bhaile faoi láthairI'm at home at the moment.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sa ḃaile faoi láṫairI'm at home at the moment.

result.eng: She is the talk of the town.
result.ga: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.orig: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.html: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.

result.eng: A town with more canals than streets.
result.ga: Baile ar mhó líon na gcanálacha ná líon na sráideanna
result.orig: Baile ar mhó líon na gcanálacha ná líon na sráideanna
result.html: Baile ar mhó líon na gcanálacha ná líon na sráideannaA town with more canals than streets.
result.ponchtml: Baile ar ṁó líon na gcanálaċa ná líon na sráideannaA town with more canals than streets.

result.eng: They live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.

result.eng: She would send money to her family at home.
result.ga: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.orig: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.html: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaileShe would send money to her family at home.
result.ponchtml: Ċuireaḋ sí airgead ċuig a muintir sa ḃaileShe would send money to her family at home.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: The Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ga: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.orig: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.html: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ponchtml: Rinne na Naitsiṫe ár uafásaċ ar ḟir an ḃaile mar ḋíoltas ar ġníoṁarṫa Ḟriṫḃeartaíoċt na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.

result.eng: Welcome home.
result.ga: Sé do bheatha 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Sé do bheatha 'un an bhaile
result.html: Sé do bheatha 'un an bhaileWelcome home.
result.ponchtml: Sé do ḃeaṫa 'un an ḃaileWelcome home.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.

result.eng: He could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ga: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.orig: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.html: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmhaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiocfaḋ leis a ġaḃáil ċun an ḃaile ar ṗócaí folṁaHe could not come home with empty pockets.

result.eng: The city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ga: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
result.orig: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
result.html: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibhThe city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an baile mór fá ċupla céad míle dóiḃThe city was a couple hundred miles away.
